Articles.Content:
But that is a clone.

I kill Negan.

My hill.

I take over Joseph Kerman's mind and force him to give me the hill.

My hill.

You wake up in the night, and see a gentleman wearing a red-and-green striped sweater and brown [fedora.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fedora_%28hat%29 "Fedora (hat)")

Freddy's Hill.

I beat Freddy with a baseball bat, and then subject him to a lit <abbr title="Solid fuel Rocket Booster">SRB</abbr> in the face at 150 m/s.

my hill.

You wake up and meet [Freddy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freddy_Krueger) again.

Freddy's dream.

I kill Freddy, therefore his possessions are mine to take

my dream

I turn this ~~car~~ dream around and twist it to my benefit. Which just so happens to be your expense.

*My* dream!

you have a nightmare, in which I take your dream with a dreamcatcher

my dreamcatcher full of dreams

I steal the dreams out of your catcher. They all involve a single cookie.

My cookie, on top of a lonely hill.

Suddenly you read a roadsign on a road below the hill "Goodsprings". You hear a shot and realize that you are the Courier #6.

Buried cookie,

Good thing you were a bad shot. Turns out the cookie was wanted by Caesar's Legion.

Caesar's cookie.

Cicero debates for the cookie and gains possession of it. 

Cicero's cookie.
Sheogorath returns to his palace with the cookie and morphs back.

I lie in wait for the cookie and take it back to the hill and destroy it. This is not the cookie game.

My Hill.

I invalidate the hill

my hill

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, qzgy said:
> 
> 
> This is not the cookie game.
> 

Old hill gets invalidated.

A hill of cookies gets baked. Cookie hill.

![King-of-Hyrule-e1365229854739.jpg](http://www.zeldadungeon.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/King-of-Hyrule-e1365229854739.jpg)

![ss-100806-pakistan-03.ss_full1.jpg](http://www.chaostrophic.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/ss-100806-pakistan-03.ss_full1.jpg)

Your cookie hill becomes soggy, and disintegrates. I sit on a nearby mountain peak with shotgun, and yell Git orrrff my Lannnd! At anyone who approaches.

My mountain/hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-04-22T19:45:16Z" title="04/22/2017 07:45  PM" data-short="7 yr">April 22, 2017</time> by MiffedStarfish**

I sneak up on you and plug up your shotgun, causing it to misfire and explode when you pull the trigger. You head to the hospital for treatment while I claim your hill.

my hill.

I pickpocket the hill

my hill

I jail the pickpocket.

My pickpocket.

I wonder how this thread is still alive, and in doing so create a new hill.

My hill.

throws kraken up hill

My hill

**Edited <time datetime="2017-04-23T22:19:40Z" title="04/23/2017 10:19  PM" data-short="7 yr">April 23, 2017</time> by kerbinorbiter**
  
My hill

Asks a god to do a personal favor and smites all the "new n' hip" hills and return to the original one and claim it. With a furry potato

My furry potato and hill

Smashes Skye's space potato into hill

My right angled hill (because of the way the astoroid hit the hill)

I bend the hill. Your brain explodes as it tries to comprehend the non-right-angle.

My cockeyed hill.
